thesis: Operative Ekphrasis: This repository contains the tools, artifacts, and research for the CORE-AGE project, focusing on "Words Become Worlds" (WAG) â€” a framework for translating natural language into 3D spatial geometries and narrative ontologies.

zones.label: LEGO INPUTS
zones.intent: Parse raw LDraw geometry into 3D meshes.

zones.label: TETRAD ENGINE
zones.intent: Sort complexity using McLuhan's four laws.
zones.decision: The Grid is the physics engine for all knowledge.

zones.label: WAG PEAKS
zones.intent: Translate natural language into spatial worlds.
zones.decision: Text IS the World (No database required).

zones.label: TRAIL OBSERVATORY
zones.intent: Visualize the creator's journey as a map.
zones.decision: Visualize metadata as a playable territory.

timeline.label: PROJECT GENOME
timeline.decision: The visualization must be generated from the provenance

timeline.quote: This document is watching you reading it.

timeline.label: WAG WORKSHOP LAUNCH
timeline.desc: First Public Demo of Operative Ekphrasis
timeline.decision: Simplify the interface for non-technical users

rich_genome.D (Decision): Simplify the interface for non-technical users
rich_genome.I (Intent): To teach the machine to listen

timeline.quote: It wasn't real until other people touched it.

timeline.label: NEURAL EMBEDDINGS
timeline.decision: Move from keyword search to semantic proximity

rich_genome.D (Decision): Move from keyword search to semantic proximity
rich_genome.I (Intent): To find connections we didn't know existed

timeline.quote: The library is no longer sorted by alphabet, but by meaning.

timeline.label: THE CONTEXT SINGULARITY
timeline.decision: Brute-force the context window with raw text

rich_genome.D (Decision): Brute-force the context window with raw text
rich_genome.I (Intent): To let the LLM see the 'Whole Elephant'

timeline.quote: If we feed it everything, maybe it will understand the shape of the void.

timeline.label: MENTO OPERATIONS (4 Files)
timeline.desc: Context: THE INVARIANT SUBSTRATE Â· Establishing the Material Provenance of the System
timeline.decision: Port the cinematography engine to the web.

rich_genome.D (Decision): Port the cinematography engine to the web.
rich_genome.I (Intent): To ensure every atom of the world is addressable

readings: Hui, Yuk. 'On the Existence of Digital Objects'
Fuller, Matthew. 'Media Ecologies: Materialist Energies in Art and Technoculture'
timeline.quote: The brick is not just a shape; it is a unit of logic. By enforcing LDraw standards, we inherit 20 years of community geometry.

timeline.desc: Context: DEEP TIME OBSERVATORY Â· Meta-Cognition and Systemic Self-Awareness

rich_genome.D (Decision): The map must be part of the territory
rich_genome.I (Intent): To make the development process legible as an artwork

readings: Bateson, Gregory. 'Steps to an Ecology of Mind'
timeline.quote: A project that does not know its own history is doomed to just be 'content'. This genome is the memory of the system.

timeline.label: AUTOPSY OF LINE 22

rich_genome.T (Trail): Bug â†’ Deep Analysis â†’ Tool
rich_genome.M (Metadata): Parsed LDraw line numbers, mesh indices
rich_genome.D (Decision): Build a dedicated tool just to fix one bug
rich_genome.I (Intent): To understand why the mesh was tearing

timeline.quote: We found the ghost in the machine, and it was a floating decimal point.
